divs: Sighting DetailsI sat along the Columbia river, and saw a large oval shaped silent UFO traveling East. It was metallic colored, and shifted (as it traveled East) into a pyramid shape with smooth edges. It then shifted into a flat oval, getting closer to the water, then went out of my limited sight up stream. I first thought it might be a balloon, because there wasn't any noise, but there also wasn't any wind. Normally the wind travels West bound, against the direction this traveled. It was about the size of 2 buses. Unfortunately I did not have a camera. An important aspect of this sight was I asked what I could do with improving my job. A very strong thought occurred to me, what if, right now, all you needed to do was be Love? Instantly, I rejoiced with being Love first. Every time I hear of UFO's, an appropriate welcome is being Love not fear.
Summary: Silently foating aprox. 50 yards above the river, a UFO traveled East.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around September 30th 2008
